- spaces with   when there is at least two consecutive spaces.

timeline.bodyText: As this helper handle only end of line and spaces, call it something like keepSpacesAndEndOfLine may be less misleading. At the first glance, I thought this helper was able to manage strong, italic and stuff like that.
